channel.title: My noob client questions :p
channel.description:
OK so I have a few questions! :D
1. How do I make it so anything above 10m doesn't turn green etc.. the text I mean, it says 10M but in green..
2. How do I change the skull above my head, as at the minute it is the kalphite pray sprite.. :S
3. If I have a cache / deob, how do I make it so I can connect to my server with it. I have the 194deob, and I want to be able to run it and use for a server (an old server)
4. Can someone post a link to an EXTREMELY OLD empty source..
:D Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2009, 06:24:04 am[/size][hr]Btw I'm using 317 gameframe

item.title: My noob client questions :p
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

OK so I have a few questions!

  1. How do I make it so anything above 10m doesn’t turn green etc… the text I mean, it says 10M but in green…

  2. How do I change the skull above my head, as at the minute it is the kalphite pray sprite… :S

  3. If I have a cache / deob, how do I make it so I can connect to my server with it. I have the 194deob, and I want to be able to run it and use for a server (an old server)

  4. Can someone post a link to an EXTREMELY OLD empty source…

Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2009, 06:24:04 am[/size][hr]Btw I’m using 317 gameframe
